General.Name: Henderson Far East Income Ltd
General.Description: Henderson Far East Income Limited is a closed ended balanced mutual fund launched and managed by Henderson Investment Funds Limited. The fund is managed by Henderson Global Investors Limited. It invests in the public equity and fixed income markets of Pacific, Australasia, Japan, and India. The fund invests in stocks of companies operating across diversified sectors. Henderson Far East Income Ltd was formed on May 1, 1930 and is domiciled in Jersey, Channel Islands.

ESGScores.Disclaimer: The ESG data currently in a very early Beta stage and not intended for any production use. It will be removed from the feed on December 31, 2020.
